examples.korean: Her body was sent home for burial. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀의 시신은 매장을 위해 고향으로 보내졌다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Her body was sent home for burial. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Tentacles of fear closed around her body. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 공포의 촉수가 그녀의 몸을 에워쌌다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Tentacles of fear closed around her body. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The dead body was just dumped by the roadside. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 사체는 그냥 도로변에 버려졌다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The dead body was just dumped by the roadside. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Detectives found no marks on the body. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 형사들은 그 시체에서 아무런 흔적도 찾지 못했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Detectives found no marks on the body. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The jolt seemed to jar every bone in her body. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 덜컹거림이 그녀의 모든 뼈마디에 충격을 주는 것 같았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
